text: Le Flon is a municipality of the district Veveyse in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. It was created on 1 January 2004 by the former municipalities of Bouloz, Pont (Veveyse) and Porsel.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 19 July 2011 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Veveyse
title: Le Flon
